The information Powerhouse within your Print MIS/ERP solution

EFI Print MIS/ERP solution is built with a powerhouse of information available at your fingertips.

Did you know the EFI Midmarket Print Suite is embedded with a powerful tool to give you a holistic view into your business? The EFI PaceStation query tool allows you to dive into any aspect of your database for deeper understanding of your processes, production, and business. Gain insight with this dynamic inquiry tool and see meaningful reports to help you drive your business.

Are you taking full advantage of this dynamic tool that is already part of your MIS/ERP solution? Take a look at this first video to get started with your refresher course into EFI PaceStation.

Request our 3-Part video series with no additional cost or license fees!

Request your video series today!

Basic PaceStation

Want to learn how to build a basic query in PaceStation? This step by step tutorial will walk you through building a simple query and export it to an excel spreadsheet.

PaceStation Advanced Features

Once you’ve mastered the basic functions, it’s time to move on to more advanced functions. This video walks you through several features of PaceStation and how to use them in your business.

Object Model

This tutorial looks at how data within Pace is structured in order to better understand how to built queries. Learn the Pace data hierarchy and the relationship between data and objects within Pace.

Need more information on how to utilize PaceStation further? We have put together a series of three more videos to help you gain a deeper understanding of the value and power at your fingertips today, with no additional cost or license fees! PaceStation is included with every EFI Midmarket Print Suite. Request more information and you can get started on your PaceStation path to excellence.

Request your video series today!

Always-on EFI Cloud ready services

As an EFI cloud managed solution you won’t ever have to worry about MarketDirect server availability or uptime, you can focus on servicing your customers and your business. Our professional services team keep your solution up-to-date and running smoothly, alerting you to potential threats and providing 24/7 monitoring.
